nodes.text: Star Wars: Pilots & Spacecraft Glow in the Dark
Star Wars: Pilots & Spaceships Glow in the Dark was a young readers book published by Golden Books in 1997 which details the vehicles used in the Star Wars Original trilogy.
Describes Luke Skywalker, R2-D2, Chewbacca, Han Solo, Princess Leia, Jabba the Hutt, Boba Fett, Darth Vader, and the craft they pilot
